overview: In February 2016 and after journeying through the outskirts of Marrakech’s various townships renown for their various handmade crafts – Tamasloht, Ourika, Dumnass, Asni, he produces his third known film project. 'Unknown Soldier' unfolds as a sequence of almost holy, nativity scenes, like paintings, in a slow motion of hands, clay, pots, fossils, mounds of fruits and vegetables, etc. These images feel like sensual odes to the makers of crafts, those who have found serenity and equilibrium with their surroundings.”
title: Unknown Soldier
